title: Bug 117981: Item selection issue in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead. As a result, it is not possible to select any items in the outline view on the first try.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the application and navigate to the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.
3. Observe that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.
4. Retry the selection and observe the same behavior.
